thread.title: 'More needs to be done to help BAME people with mental health issues', warns charity | Central
thread.title_full: 'More needs to be done to help BAME people with mental health issues', warns charity | Central - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: 'More needs to be done to help BAME people with mental health issues', warns charity | Central
text:
A Nottingham-based charity says not enough is being done to help people from black, Asian and minority ethnic communities experiencing mental health issues. Awaaz says despite a number of reports, including some commissioned by the government, the issue still is not being tackled.
The charity says that over the last 20 years, figures suggest that people from ethnic communities have a tougher time accessing services than white people. Our health correspondent Nancy Cole reports.
Play video Last updated Thu 22 Oct 2015 Health Mental health Birmingham
